panels.title: Rename 'Cold Approach' to 'Starting a Convo'
panels.scene: A town crier stands on a box, ringing a bell. Villagers are either weeping dramatically or cheering. Banners are being changed from 'COLD APPROACH' to 'STARTING A CONVO'. The knight stands to the side, looking bored.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: No more shall we suffer the icy grip of the...cold approach!

panels.title: Add gamification utils
panels.scene: Villagers are playing a medieval video game on a giant screen made of woven tapestries. They are cheering as points rack up. The knight stands nearby, looking at code on a scroll.

panels.title: Add category column to scenarios
panels.scene: A large group of scribes is frantically re-organizing scrolls in a massive library. They are moving scrolls from piles labeled 'Slug-Based' to shelves with shiny new labels. The knight is pointing at the shelves.

bubbles.speaker: Scribe
bubbles.text: Slug-based filtering is DEAD! Long live the category column!

panels.title: 5 commits. 3 features. 2 planning docs. And fun.
panels.scene: The knight sits on a crate, looking tired. In the background, villagers are building a giant golden arcade machine with the knight's face on it.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: We shall play games in his honor forever!

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: Just... please don't name your kids 'feat:'
